text: Which of the following is correct regarding electric charge? (i) If a body is having positive charge, then there is shortage of electrons. (ii) If a body is having negative charge, then there is excess of electrons. (iii) Minimum possible charge = ± 1.6 × <math><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>-19</mn></msup></math>C.  (iv) Charge is quantised, i.e. Q = ± ne, where n = 1, 2, 3, 4,…
